EmailTemplate.name: 18.ATM-World-Congress-Eblast.SR1801021134.Email1
EmailTemplate.subject: Be our guest at World ATM Congress
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Prioritizing safety and security in every connection Be our guest at World ATM Congress
The air traffic management (ATM) industry has been discussing emerging technologies for the past few years. The World ATM Congress <[[https://www.nokia.com/en_int/news/events/world-atm-congress]]> is the place to hear about SESAR, NextGen and other ATM programs.
Nokia creates the technology to connect the world with sophisticated solutions that are intuitive to use. We listen to your future needs and we help shape your future based on a clear view of technology opportunities and constraints.
Our experts will be on site to discuss any topics that you are interested in and demonstrate our latest innovative products, solutions and services.
Plan to attend an exciting conference session <[[https://www.worldatmcongress.org/nokia-atm-theatre]]> featuring a presentation on critical communication colutions harnessing new network strategies.
For more information on Nokia solutions, visit our webpage <[[https://networks.nokia.com/aviation]]>. Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
